.travis.yml

 
sudo: false
language: node_js
before_install:
  - (test $NPM_LEGACY && npm install -g npm@2 && npm install -g npm@3) || true
notifications:
  email: false
matrix:
  fast_finish: true
  include:
  - node_js: '0.8'
    env: NPM_LEGACY=true
  - node_js: '0.10'
    env: NPM_LEGACY=true
  - node_js: '0.11'
    env: NPM_LEGACY=true
  - node_js: '0.12'
    env: NPM_LEGACY=true
  - node_js: 1
    env: NPM_LEGACY=true
  - node_js: 2
    env: NPM_LEGACY=true
  - node_js: 3
    env: NPM_LEGACY=true
  - node_js: 4
  - node_js: 5
  - node_js: 6
  - node_js: 7
  - node_js: 8
  - node_js: 9
script: "npm run test"
